title: Its a shame :(
body:
Its such a shame about bloodmoon Yasuo's hair, that could have been a really nice skin...

hes a really poplar champ, and its one of the most popular skin lines, riot would have made so much more money if they put a little bit of effort into it.

replies.body: Dude, the mask aside makes it such a cool skin, let alone the backing animation has totally changed. Not enough effort?...
No flute sound change, the hair is way too red, having it a dark crimson would have been better than a bright cartoon red.
